craftable.name: AdaptiveHelm
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

radiant.name: JakshotheProtean
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 60 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 2 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 40 Ability Power. Gain 20 Mana every 3 seconds.

craftable.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craftable.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

radiant.name: RadientJeweledGauntlet
radiant.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadientBloodthirster
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 40% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craftable.name: BlueSentinel
craftable.add_attrs:
Max mana reduced by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 5% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientBlueBuff
radiant.add_attrs:
Max mana reduce by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 20% more damage for 12 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craftable.name: BrambleVest
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 5% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

radiant.name: RadientBrambleVest
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 15% max health.

Take 25% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by an attack, deal 175 magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craftable.name: Crownguard
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

radiant.name: CrownguardRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 50% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.

craftable.name: DragonsClaw
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

radiant.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 15% max health.

Every 2 seconds, regenerate 10% max Health.

craftable.name: Evenshroud
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

radiant.name: EvenshroudRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Grant 70 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 20 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: Fimbulwinter
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

radiant.name: FimbulwinterRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 50% max Health shield that lasts 10 seconds and gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: GiantSlayer
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 25% Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

radiant.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radiant.add_attrs: Gain 50% Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.add_attrs: After damaging a Shield, gain 25% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

radiant.name: RadientStridebreaker
radiant.add_attrs: After damaging a Shield, gain 50% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

craftable.name: GuardianAngel
craftable.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radiant.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, heal 100% missing health and gain 85% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

radiant.name: RadientGuinsoosRageblade
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks grant +10% stacking Attack Speed.

craftable.name: HandofJustice
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
- 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

radiant.name: RadientHandofJustice
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
-50% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power.
- 30% Omnivamp

craftable.name: HextechGunblade
craftable.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

radiant.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radiant.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 35% of damage dealt.

craftable.name: InfinityEdge
craftable.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

radiant.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radiant.add_attrs:
Ability can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: IonicSpark
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientIonicSpark
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 200% of the Mana spent..

Also, heal 1.5% max Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: IronWill
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

radiant.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

Also, heal 1.5% max Health each second.

craftable.name: LastWhisper
craftable.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

radiant.name: RadientLastWhisper
radiant.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only one per champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craftable.name: LordsEdge
craftable.add_attrs: +50% Attack Damage, +8% Damage Amp

radiant.name: RadientDeathblade
radiant.add_attrs: +105% Attack Damage, +12% Damage Amp

craftable.name: LudensEcho
craftable.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

radiant.name: RadientArchangelsStaff
radiant.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 40 Ability Power every 4 seconds in combat.

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: NashorsTooth
craftable.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

radiant.name: NashorsToothRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 120% Attack Speed for 8 seconds.

craftable.name: Quicksilver
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 14 seconds. During this time, gain 4% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientQuicksilver
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds. For 14 seconds, gain 9% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craftable.add_attrs: +50 Ability Power, +15% Damage Amp

radiant.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radiant.add_attrs: +70 Ability Power, +33% Damage Amp

craftable.name: RedBuffItem
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientRedBuff
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 2% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.add_attrs: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

radiant.name: RadientRedemption
radiant.add_attrs: Heal allies within 2 hexes for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

craftable.name: RunaansHurricane
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a neaby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage as physical damage.

radiant.name: RadientRunaansHurricane
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage as physical damage.

craftable.name: SpearofShojin
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

radiant.name: RadientSpearofShojin
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks grant 10 bonus Mana.

craftable.name: StatikkShiv
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deal 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deals 95 magic damage and 30% Shreds 8 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: SteadfastHeart
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 8% Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 15% Durability.

radiant.name: RadientSteadfastHeart
radiant.add_attrs: Gain 16% Durability. While above 40% Health, instead gain 30% Durability.

craftable.name: SteraksGage
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

radiant.name: SteraksMegashield
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 40% max Health and 60% Attack Damage.

craftable.name: SunfireCape
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientSunfireCape
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received

craftable.name: ThiefsGloves
craftable.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

radiant.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radiant.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

craftable.name: TitansResolve
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

radiant.name: RadientTitansResolve
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 3% Attack Damage 3 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: WarmogsArmor
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 12% max health.

radiant.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 20% max health.

Heal 1.5% max Health per second.
